content:

inventory=[{"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 61, "index": 13}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_blue_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 20}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 7, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a lapis block, I need to place 9 lapis lazuli in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the lapis lazuli from slot 42 into the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
